commons.com.tbitsGlobal.utils.client.tags
Class TagsUtils

java.lang.Object
  commons.com.tbitsGlobal.utils.client.tags.TagsUtils

public class TagsUtils
extends java.lang.Object

The class provides utility functions for all the tags related functionalities. It also maintains a list of existing tags for each user. This list is managed internally.

Author:
karan
